title: BRIEF-Cohen & Steers Announces Preliminary Assets Under Management
text: March 8, 2018 / 9:47 PM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Cohen & Steers Announces Preliminary Assets Under Management Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - Cohen & Steers Inc: * COHEN & STEERS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AND NET FLOWS FOR FEBRUARY 2018 * COHEN & STEERS INC - ‍PRELIMINARY ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF $57.7 BILLION AS OF FEBRUARY 28, 2018, A DECREASE OF $3.6 BILLION FROM JANUARY 31, 2018​ * COHEN & STEERS - FALL IN PRELIMINARY AUM AS OF FEB 28 WAS DUE TO MARKET DEPRECIATION OF $3.0 BILLION, DISTRIBUTIONS OF $280 MILLION, NET OUTFLOWS OF $273 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
